sentence.Network_cn: 半神半人是神只与凡人所生的后代.

entry.tran: (神话中的)次神;(尤指)半神半人
entry.def: In mythology, a demigod is a less important god, especially one who is half god and half human.

entry.tran: 被神化的人，像神一样受人崇拜的人(如政治家、作家、音乐家等)
entry.def: If you describe a famous or important person such as a politician, writer, or musician as a demigod, you mean that you disapprove of the way in which people admire them and treat them like a god.

means.word_mean: 1. a person with great powers and abilities
2. a person who is part mortal and part god
